code: import axios from'axios';var url='https://fullstack-invoices-project.herokuapp.com/invoices';export var fetchInvoices=function fetchInvoices(){return axios.get(url);};export var createInvoice=function createInvoice(newIvoice){return axios.post(url,newIvoice);};export var fetchInvoice=function fetchInvoice(id){return axios.get("".concat(url,"/").concat(id));};export var deleteInvoice=function deleteInvoice(id){return axios.delete("".concat(url,"/").concat(id));};export var updateInvoice=function updateInvoice(id,updatedInvoice){return axios.put("".concat(url,"/").concat(id),updatedInvoice);};export var updateInvoiceState=function updateInvoiceState(id){return axios.patch("".concat(url,"/").concat(id,"/invoiceStatus"));};
